A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good follow up from the Force Awaken\, entertaining throughout. Though\, if you're a casual fan of star wars\, you might need to bring someone who has the knowledge of star wars methodology (especially Jedi stuff) because the story passed by with lightning speed. I had some pacing and some plot issues as well as few characters that I didn't care for. With that said\, the movie is fun to watch\, with family and friends perhaps...
